infos.value: Explain. This turn of events is most curious.
...I will explain later.
The more we linger, the more the guards will take notice.
And I'm to just trust you blindly?
Know this. I have not forgotten the taste of your boot heel.
Yes, yes, I'll listen to whatever grievances you wish to airâ€”after we've escaped from the castle.
Are you implying you wish to return to Hourne?
I never left.
It was under King Robb's orders that I infiltrated Sadali's inner circle. My allegiance has never wavered.
You claim to be a...a double agent? Save your lies.
It is no lie.
And if we are to speak of cold, hard truths, I care not what happens to you so long as King Robb lives.
But upon hearing that King Robb is grievously wounded, I made up my mind.
I threw away my entire life and infiltrated the Church under his orders.
In exchange, he swore to look after my mother.
I see. If anything were to happen to him, that promise would...
Yes. King Robb is the only one who knows of all this.
So, saving me suddenly became a matter of personal interest.
Very well.
If the worst should occur, I shall take responsibility for supporting what family you have left.
...You would have my eternal gratitude.
Let's go. There's no time to spare.
